availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, fisherman. Ohio native. Married to Christiana M. Fife. Fisherman in Crittenden County, Kentucky, in 1860. Fisherman in Jefferson County, Illinois, in 1863. Charged with murder in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1864. Charged with selling liquor without a license in Pope County, Illinois, in 1864. Arrested in Massoc County, Illinois, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District 1, p. 416.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jefferson County, IL, June 1863, p. 207.
KYR-0001-006-0039.
